Wowhead
Wowhead

Protect the Frontier

Kill 8 Prowlers and 5 Young Forest Bears, and then return to Guard Thomas at the east Elwynn bridge.
  •  
Prowler slain (8)
  •  
Young Forest Bear slain (5)

Description

Hail, <name>. Wild animals are growing more and more aggressive the farther we get from Goldshire, and the Eastvale Logging Camp suffers nearly constant attacks from wolves and bears!

We could use your help out here.

Reward

You will receive:
Lesser Healing Potion

Progress

Have you killed those wolves and bears?

Completion

Thanks a lot for the help, <name>. Something in the forest must be making these animals so bold.

Whatever it is, I hope it stays there.

Gains

Upon completion of quests, get:
  • 630 Experience
  • 75 Reputation with Stormwind
